name: UMH Properties, Inc.
description: UMH Properties, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the ownership and operation of manufactured home communities and multi-family residential properties. Founded in 1968 and headquartered in Freehold, New Jersey, UMH aims to provide quality housing across the United States through its diverse portfolio. The company owns and operates over 120 manufactured home communities, many of which are located in key markets that benefit from high demand for affordable housing. UMH is committed to enhancing the living experience of its residents by providing well-maintained communities and excellent customer service. Additionally, UMH is actively involved in the development of new communities and the acquisition of existing properties to expand its footprint in the manufactured housing sector. The company emphasizes sustainability and community engagement, contributing to local economies while addressing the growing need for affordable housing solutions. As a publicly traded entity on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker UMH, UMH Properties provides investors with an opportunity to participate in the growth of the manufactured housing market.

seo.meta_title: UMH Properties, Inc. | Manufactured Home Communities and REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore UMH Properties, Inc., a leading REIT specializing in manufactured home communities and multi-family residential properties. Discover their commitment to affordable housing and community engagement.

faq.question: What does UMH Properties focus on?
faq.answer: UMH Properties focuses on owning and operating manufactured home communities and multi-family residential properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of UMH Properties?
faq.answer: Samuel A. Landy is the CEO of UMH Properties, Inc.

faq.question: Where is UMH Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: UMH Properties is headquartered in Freehold, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does UMH manage?
faq.answer: UMH manages manufactured home communities and multi-family residential properties.
